How difficult is it to use? I'm pretty nooby when it comes to modding and can't speak any code languages, but I can learn simple procedures like basic CFG editing and modding on games without good support (the early days of MineCraft, Prison Architect and many alpha games) so I'm not completely dumb. Could someone of my ability use such a plugin?

There is no way to make my imported textures work... How do you guys do that please ?

Edited January 9, 2014 by Shepard
I'm waiting to download this until its more finished. I really can't wait to see what more customization this gets like textures, atmospheres, and RINGS!!!

There is no way to make my imported textures work... How do you guys do that please ?

Yeah i need help on that to

Very nice , I look forward to community planet packs! Do you have any plans for custom oceans (Textures, texture scaling, Waves?) , and behaviours (Like a .dll with a monobehavour that is loaded onto the planet)? possibly even PQSCitys, but we have kerbtown for that.

Also, what is the permission system for "distributing" planet systems?

If your new system isn't working you probably missed something while renaming the files or in the CFG files. Look in the log window for hints.

As far as a textured planet goes look at Barney, Slade, Planetar and Moonar. All use simple textures I got out of SE. NOTE the only texture format that will work is PNG. No jpgs.

When exporting from SE use 2048 as the size. The only textures needed are surface_bump and surface_diff. They should be converted to png and then renamed <planetname>_height and <planetname>_color respectively. The rest are generated when you export from PF.

You can distribute your updated system by just zipping the directory and write some install instructions on where to unzip it in PF.

8gig is more than enough. I only have 4.

Krag
how can atmospheres be added and changed up?

This is what I've been looking for, just to add small the occasional small body to the game - hope it works!

Yeah, me too. Let me know if it doesn't and I'll fix.

Also i did a test copy Barney's config an change template from Tylo to kerbin in map view it looks ok then in flight its a bluish white layered void with no surface is there anyway i can fix it?
Kerbin won't work as a template currently. Too complicated. Same with Laythe, although I got Erin to work (barely). I don't remember if I ever got Eve to work or not.

So I made a small asteroid with only 100 meter radius but still 1g of surface gravity in orbit around Kerbin:

Using RealSolarSystem along with this mod works pretty well, and with the RSS config file being a bit more straightforward in changing physical parameters for a body, you can build pretty much anything.

Hello... I have a quick question... I have been playing around and learning the system... I've managed to produce a system based off of the serious system... Which works perfectly great however I then tried to add a Skelton to the system... (changed the names of the files like the others and there orbits) however the Skelton copy does not seem to appear... My question is... Does copying and adjusting work on only things added after initial release or can it work with the original added planets? And if so how? If anyone can help it would be great

Hello... I have a quick question... I have been playing around and learning the system... I've managed to produce a system based off of the serious system... Which works perfectly great however I then tried to add a Skelton to the system... (changed the names of the files like the others and there orbits) however the Skelton copy does not seem to appear... My question is... Does copying and adjusting work on only things added after initial release or can it work with the original added planets? And if so how? If anyone can help it would be great

theoretically it should...are you updating the .system file? and the file names are right? i've forgotten to update the .system, or messed up the name and have it not appear at all
